prompt: Design a cozy photo gallery viewer with a warm, rustic aesthetic. The main image, showcasing a forest cabin, should have 18px rounded corners and a soft brown shadow (opacity 0.12, blur 8px). Include a horizontal thumbnail gallery with 5 images (80x80px, 10px corners, 8px spacing) in a wooden-textured container (use a light brown color, #D2B48C). Place three action buttons in a centered row at the bottom: a red heart icon (#D32F2F), a green share icon (#388E3C), and a brown download icon (#5D4037), each in a rectangular container with 12px padding and a beige background (#F5F5D5). Use a warm beige scaffold background (#FFF3E0) with 16px padding. The app bar should have a dark brown background (#4E342E), a white back arrow, and a title 'Rustic Gallery' in white bold text. The design should feel warm, inviting, and slightly rustic with balanced spacing.
